name: Glitch (itch) (AgentWebFoot)
description:
Control the robot to find the lost magical amulet while not overheating in the lava.

Note: During the exporting process the audio file corrupted for the "ladder bot" was corrupted and doesn't play. It was suppose to read, "I can use the legs from this bot so you don't need to craft ladders anymore" sorry for the inconvenience, such is life.
